title: SWAT FONT?
content:
Hey you gods of type   
   
I need some sugestions for a typeface for the word "S.W.A.T." You know real police-kind font...   
   
Does anybody have a clue?
author: anonymous

comments.content: or Univers, or Franklin Gothic, but whatever font you use, go ULTRA BOLD!

Hey Tiff   
   
Very nice that Super Duty.... I might try that one...   
   
Thanks a billion   
   
Mark
Try any generic authoritarian font like Helvetica Bold
